data.eml:eml: Description of two new genera (Antarctotetilla, Levantiniella) and a new species of Tetillidae

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Carella, Mirco, Uriz, Maria J. (2018): Description of two new genera (Antarctotetilla, Levantiniella) and a new species of Tetillidae. Zootaxa 4455 (2): 295-321, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4455.2.3
